Another option is "End of Watch" (2016), which showcases a unique bond between two police officers as they navigate the challenges and dangers of their careers together. The film offers an authentic look at friendship and teamwork under intense circumstances, featuring stellar performances from Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Peña.
